trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when there is an attempt to combine two delegates based on the <xref:System.Delegate> type instead of the <xref:System.MulticastDelegate> type.
trans-unit.target: 当尝试组合两个委托时引发的异常基于<xref:System.Delegate>类型而不是<xref:System.MulticastDelegate>类型。</xref:System.MulticastDelegate> </xref:System.Delegate>

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: Only delegates based on the <xref:System.MulticastDelegate> type can be combined.
trans-unit.target: 仅委托基于<xref:System.MulticastDelegate>类型可以组合。</xref:System.MulticastDelegate>

trans-unit.source: Two multicast delegates can be combined using the <xref:System.MulticastDelegate.CombineImpl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用组合两个多路广播的委托<xref:System.MulticastDelegate.CombineImpl%2A>方法。</xref:System.MulticastDelegate.CombineImpl%2A>

trans-unit.source: MulticastNotSupportedException uses the HRESULT COR_E_MULTICASTNOTSUPPORTED, which has the value 0x80131514.
trans-unit.target: MulticastNotSupportedException 使用 HRESULT COR_E_MULTICASTNOTSUPPORTED，其值 0x80131514。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of MulticastNotSupportedException, see the <xref:System.MulticastNotSupportedException.%23ctor%2A> constructors.
trans-unit.target: MulticastNotSupportedException 的实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅<xref:System.MulticastNotSupportedException.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。</xref:System.MulticastNotSupportedException.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.MulticastNotSupportedException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.MulticastNotSupportedException"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "This operation cannot be performed with the specified delegates."
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>为系统提供的消息描述该错误，如"此操作无法执行与指定的委托。"的新实例的属性</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>

trans-unit.source: This message takes into account the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此消息将当前系统区域性考虑在内。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.MulticastNotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.MulticastNotSupportedException>.</xref:System.MulticastNotSupportedException>实例的初始属性的值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The localized error message string.|
trans-unit.target: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|空引用 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)。 | |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|本地化的错误消息字符串。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.MulticastNotSupportedException"></xref> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.MulticastNotSupportedException"></xref>与指定的错误消息的类。

trans-unit.source: The content of the `message` parameter should be understandable to the user.
trans-unit.target: 内容`message`参数应为用户所理解。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.MulticastNotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.MulticastNotSupportedException>.</xref:System.MulticastNotSupportedException>实例的初始属性的值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.|
trans-unit.target: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|空引用 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)。 | |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|错误消息字符串。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 描述错误的消息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.MulticastNotSupportedException"></xref> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.MulticastNotSupportedException"></xref>使用指定的错误消息和对导致此异常的内部异常的引用的类。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 前一个异常的直接结果应包含中的前一个异常的引用引发的异常，<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性返回相同的值传递到构造函数中，则为空引用 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中) 如果<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性不会提供给构造函数的内部异常值。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.MulticastNotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示<xref:System.MulticastNotSupportedException>.</xref:System.MulticastNotSupportedException>实例的初始属性的值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|The inner exception reference.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.|
trans-unit.target: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|内部异常引用。 | |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|错误消息字符串。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常的异常。

trans-unit.source: If the `inner` parameter is not a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic), the current exception is raised in a <xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果`inner`参数不是 null 引用 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>在 Visual Basic 中) 中, 引发当前异常<xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref>处理内部异常的块。
